name: Lantalker2
body:
FSLanTalker2 (C) Oliver Strauss oliver.strauss@gmail.com
Last Update: 20 March 2013

FSLanTalker2 is a simple server application. It provides access to the Microsoft Flight Simulator via a network. It is intended as a possible alternative to WideFS. Keep in mind, it works only with third party applications which 
are adapted to FSLanTalker2.
The implemented protocol was a quick and dirty solution for another project. An update in the near futur is possible.

To use FSLanTalker 2, start it and connect your application to the server. That's it.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
